EmailTemplate.subject: Legend Boats - Thank You for Downloading our Brochure
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Creating Memories.
That’s what we’re all about. Whether we’re working on a cool new design, adding an innovative feature, or squeezing in that extra bit of value, all we’re thinking about is providing you with the ultimate boating experience that creates memories that will last a lifetime. Hello {!Lead.FirstName},
We hope you enjoy our fully priced Boat and Pontoon brochure. At any time you have any questions, please don't hesitate to email or call us directly. 1-800-461-4050
Sincerely,
Legend Boats
